        public java.util.List<java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String>> psExec(java.lang.String... cmds)
                                                                        throws java.io.IOException
        Execute the commands specified in the String. Only the output of the last command is used afterwards.
        Specified by:
        psExec in interface Powershell
        Parameters:
        cmds - the commands
        Returns:
        the formated output as a list of maps (all key/value pairs for each object)

        java.io.IOException

      • psExec

        public java.util.List<java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String>> psExec(int outputCmd,
                                                                      java.lang.String... cmds)
                                                                        throws java.io.IOException
        Execute the commands specified in the String. The integer indicates the index of the command whose output is relevant.
        Specified by:
        psExec in interface Powershell
        Parameters:
        outputCmd - the index of the command whose output should be used
        cmds - the commands
        Returns:
        the formated output as a list of maps (all key/value pairs for each object)
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • psExec

        public java.util.List<java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String>> psExec(java.util.LinkedHashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Boolean> cmds)
                                                                        throws java.io.IOException
        Execute the commands specified in the keySet of the specified LinkedHashMap. A LinkedHashMap is used so that the commands will be executed in the order they were added to the Map. The Boolean values indicate whether output is desired for the corresponding command (true) or not (false).
        Specified by:
        psExec in interface Powershell
        Parameters:
        cmds - the LinkedHashMap of commands (as keySet)
        Returns:
        the formated output as a list of maps (all key/value pairs for each object)
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
